<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Inoculation](/Feats.aspx?ID=2135) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 207 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9)

</column>

---

You have practice combating plague, and your patients are less likely to succumb to the same [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) again for a time. When you successfully [Treat Disease](/Actions.aspx?ID=55) on someone and they fully recover from the disease, they gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against that same disease for 1 week.
name: Inoculation
